sentence.Network_en: He is quite forgetful, and called an addle head by others.
sentence.Network_cn: 他整天忘这忘那, 大家都叫他糊涂虫.

sentence.Network_en: I wish him an ounce more wit in his addle head.
sentence.Network_cn: 我希望他的笨脑袋再多一点才智.

sentence.Network_en: He won a head-to-head battle with NF leader Jean-Marie Le Pen.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在和国民阵线领袖让-马里·勒庞的正面交锋中获得了胜利。

list.abs: 【addle】什么意思_英语addle在线翻译_有道词典 ... addle plate 挡块 addle head 糊涂虫 addle pyoderma 坏疽性脓皮病.

means.word_mean: 1. a person with confused ideas; incapable of serious thought
